Jointly estimate soft labels, HRF (in an fmrihrf basis), and a
multivariate decoder directly from fMRI time series and fmridesign
event/baseline models.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`aggregate_events()`](aggregate_events.md) : Aggregate TR-level soft
  labels to events
- [`continuous_mvpa_design()`](continuous_mvpa_design.md) :
  Continuous-time MVPA design wrapper
- [`estimate_rank_auto()`](estimate_rank_auto.md) : Estimate nuisance
  rank from whitened residuals
- [`fit_hrfdecoder()`](fit_hrfdecoder.md) : Fit HRF-aware weakly
  supervised decoder
- [`hrfdecoder_model()`](hrfdecoder_model.md) : Create an hrfdecoder
  model spec for rMVPA
- [`predict_hrfdecoder()`](predict_hrfdecoder.md) : Predict with an
  hrfdecoder fit
- [`scale_color_albers()`](scale_color_albers.md) : Albers Color Scale
  for ggplot2
- [`scale_fill_albers()`](scale_fill_albers.md) : Albers Fill Scale for
  ggplot2
- [`theme_albers()`](theme_albers.md) : Albers Minimalist ggplot2 Theme

# Articles

### Tutorials

Start here for a guided introduction to hrfdecoder. These tutorials walk
you through the core workflow step by step.

- [Getting started with hrfdecoder](01-getting-started.md):

  Quick tour of the core workflow for HRF-aware weakly supervised
  decoding.

### How-tos

Task-oriented recipes for specific use cases. Each guide focuses on
solving one particular problem.

- [AR prewhitening for temporal autocorrelation](02-ar-prewhitening.md):

  Handle fMRI temporal autocorrelation with autoregressive prewhitening.

- [Integrating with rMVPA workflows](03-rmvpa-integration.md):

  Run searchlight analysis and cross-validation using the rMVPA
  framework.

### Explanations

Conceptual deep dives into how hrfdecoder works. Learn about the
algorithms, design decisions, and theoretical foundations.

- [Understanding HRF estimation](04-hrf-estimation.md):

  Learn how hrfdecoder jointly estimates the hemodynamic response
  function.

- [Weakly supervised learning for fMRI](05-weakly-supervised.md):

  Deep dive into the alternating least squares algorithm and parameter
  tuning.
